name: Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
summary:
根据指环王电影改编而来的ARPG游戏，游戏中有7名角色可供选择，而每位角色都具有不同的技能需要学习，游戏画面很漂亮，耐玩度也很高。 
官方：
      The War of the Ring nears its end... and the outcome depends on you! Based on the award winning film trilogy, this thrilling game returns you to the adventure-filled world of Middle- Earth. Play one of 6 characters - Frodo, Gandalf, Aragorn, Legolas, Gimli, and Eowyn - or two secret ones who can be unlocked during the game. Tread the eerie Paths of the Dead, defend Minas Tirith from Sauron's snarling hordes, and storm Mordor's Black Gates. Find runes to craft your own mighty weapons. Play solo or form your own fellowship in co-op mode. Reveal added secrets by connecting The Return of the King to your Nintendo GameCub
info:
• 中文名: 指环王：王者归来
  • 开发: Griptonite Games、Visceral Games
  • 发行: EA Games、Electronic Arts
  • 原作: John Ronald Reuel Tolkien
  • 别名: Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
  • 平台: GBA PC
  • 游戏类型: 动作角色扮演
  • 发行日期: 2003年11月5日
  • 官方网站: http://www.amazeent.com/games/detail/?game=458
